text: The weather is nice today.
I enjoy reading books in the evening.
Machine learning models require large datasets.
The cat sat on the windowsill watching birds.
Coffee helps me focus in the morning.
Scientists discovered a new species of frog.
The train arrived at the station on time.
She learned to play piano when she was young.
The restaurant serves excellent Italian food.
Hiking in the mountains is refreshing.
The library has an extensive collection of rare manuscripts.
Electric vehicles are becoming more popular.
The sunset painted the sky in shades of orange.
He completed the marathon in under four hours.
The garden is full of colorful flowers.
Programming requires patience and attention to detail.
The museum exhibit features ancient artifacts.
She baked a delicious chocolate cake.
The river flows gently through the valley.
Reading expands your knowledge and vocabulary.
